page.title: 07Local Industry and business
page.content: In Skelton Mr Leake has an agricultural construction company which builds the large barns made from steel girders and asbestos. Ther is also the Black Lion Public House where Mrs Chapman serves meals as well as beer etc. There is also a Public House in Kirby Hill called the Bluebell which also has a caravan site. There is also a centre of the Pig Improvement Centre where they try to improve the breeding of pigs. There are also the many farms in the different villages which act as employer for many of the local men and women.
